questions.question_text:
You create a visualization by first adding a measure to rows. Next, you add a dimension with 11 members to columns.
Assuming that all the dimensions have a non-zero value how many marks are in the view before and after the dimension is added?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. 1 before and 11 after

B Correct and
 Test with Sales and Segment on superstore
Drop Sales on row ==> 1Mark - 1row by 1 column
drop Segment on Column==> 3 Mark - 1row by 3 column
if you drop Sales and Segment ==> 3 Mark - 1row by 3 column

Selected Answer: B
1 first which then splits across the 11 dims

Selected Answer: B
B is correct tested 1 before and 11 after
1 before and 11 after, TESTED. Answer is B

Selected Answer: B
100% wrong answer, the correct is B because how diemsion with 11 members become a 12?
B is Correct.
Answer is B, I tested
Answer is B

choices.C: The default export format is PNG.
choices.D: Default exports include everything in the view including Tableau fonts.
choices.A: The exported image is a vector based file that embeds the Tableau fonts.
choices.B: The default export format is TIFF.

questions.question_text:
You want to save a view as an image that you can paste into a Microsoft Word document.
Which two statements accurately describe exporting a view as an image? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CD
C. The default export format is PNG.
D. Default exports include everything in the view including Tableau fonts.

Selected Answer: CD
default is a PNG file and it is basically a screenshot of the view as is. Title, font and all

Selected Answer: CD
CD correct
CD is Answer
CD is correct.
Answer is CD
